title: Search, Find
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Don't let the day keep movin' on
With tears and pride, they hide the sun
Look to the road that lies ahead
I'm turnin' to the dream we left to die
Dyin' alone, cry for the moment you passed me by
Baby, I don't now how
I'm only cryin' now
[Chorus]
Search, find
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God, we're forever
[Verse 2]
Don't lose the will to make it right
A day is just a brighter night
And from the flames, a dyin' love
Can learn to fly and rise above in me
All that we are, you are the heart of my everything
Maybe I lose my mind
I'm not the losin' kind

[Chorus]
Search, find
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God, we're forever
[Instrumental Break]
[Chorus]
Search, find
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love and in its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God, we're forever
Search (Search), find
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God, we're forever
Search (Search), find (Find)
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God, we're forever
Search (Search), find (Find)
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory

[Outro]
Search, find (Find)
No man, no God, no pain can sever
My love for you, God
Search (Find), find (Find)
No stone unturned, no hell, no fury
Gon' stop my love in all its glory
Search, find
No man, no God, no pain
